Description: Rim sherd of Chian Mature Animal Style pottery chalice; white slip; interior: glazed black (mostly lost); exterior: dot and billet pattern at rim above simple guilloche pattern between pairs of bands; below, part of decorative pattern with added red intruding into guilloche band.
Bibliographic references: Lemos 1991 / Archaic Pottery of Chios. The Decorated Styles (p. 260, no. 511)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.0485) (phase 2)
